tests.name: Test 1
tests.run: timeout 1 ./hexview tests/ex1.txt > output.txt && cmp -s output.txt tests/ex1.txt.hex

tests.name: Test 2
tests.run: timeout 1 ./hexview tests/ex2.jpg > output.txt && cmp -s output.txt tests/ex2.jpg.hex

tests.name: Test 3
tests.run: timeout 1 ./hexview tests/ex3.jpg > output.txt && cmp -s output.txt tests/ex3.jpg.hex

tests.name: Test 4
tests.run: timeout 1 ./hexview tests/ex4.txt > output.txt && cmp -s output.txt tests/ex4.txt.hex

tests.name: Test 5
tests.run: timeout 1 ./hexview tests/ex5.txt > output.txt && cmp -s output.txt tests/ex5.txt.hex

tests.name: Test 6
tests.run: timeout 1 ./hexview -s 24 -n 1000 tests/ex1.txt > output.txt && cmp -s output.txt tests/ex6.txt.hex

tests.name: Test 7
tests.run: timeout 1 ./hexview -n 1000 -s 24 tests/ex1.txt > output.txt && cmp -s output.txt tests/ex6.txt.hex

tests.name: Test 8
tests.run: timeout 1 ./hexview -n 10 tests/ex5.txt > output.txt && cmp -s output.txt tests/ex8.txt.hex

tests.name: Test 9
tests.run: timeout 1 ./hexview -n 100 -s 120000 tests/ex1.txt > output.txt && cmp -s output.txt tests/ex9.txt.hex

tests.name: Test 10
tests.run: timeout 1 ./hexview -n 100 tests/ex5.txt > output.txt && cmp -s output.txt tests/ex5.txt.hex

tests.name: Test 11
tests.run: timeout 1 ./hexview -s 12 tests/ex5.txt > output.txt && cmp -s output.txt tests/ex11.txt.hex
